question: The 'Smuggling in India Report 2019-20' report is associated with which organization?
explanation:
The 63rd Founding Day Celebrations of the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) was held recently.
During the occasion, Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman released the DRIâ€™s report titled Smuggling in India Report 2019-20. The report makes a detailed analysis of smuggling trends on Gold, Foreign Currency, Narcotic Drugs etc.
